Name: must_have_team
Description: Ensure a team is assigned to a project

Name: must_have_scrum_master
Description: Ensure a team has a dedicated Scrum Master

Name: must_have_product_owner
Description: Ensure a Product Owner is assigned

Name: must_have_user_stories
Description: Ensure Epics have associated User Stories

Name: must_have_tasks
Description: Ensure User Stories have associated Tasks

Name: must_have_valid_velocity
Description: Velocity must be based on actual sprints

Name: must_have_team_member_skills
Description: Each team member should have defined skills

Name: must_match_sprint_status
Description: Sprints must be in a valid status (e.g.

Name: must_have_release_plan
Description: Releases must be defined through a Release Plan

Name: must_have_blocker_resolution
Description: Blockers must have a resolution plan or status

Name: must_have_sprint_goal
Description: Every sprint should have a clearly defined goal

Name: must_have_feature_priority
Description: Features must have a priority assigned

Name: must_have_stakeholder_role
Description: Stakeholders must have a defined role

Name: must_have_sprint_backlog
Description: Each sprint must have a sprint backlog
